paper_abstract: In this paper, we model the end-to-end QoS provisioning mechanisms in the WLAN and 3GPP interworking network. For the end-to-end QoS guaranteed service, we model the control plane and user plane considering the WLAN and 3GPP interworking network. And we propose the QoS parameter/class mapping and DPS packet scheduler. By the simulation results, DPS can provide the low end-to-end delay of voice traffic, even though a traffic load increases by 96%. Especially, the end-to-end delay of voice is much smaller when the QoS parameter/class mapping and DPS are applied to the interworking network.(1)
paper_title: End-to-end QoS guaranteed service in WLAN and 3GPP interworking network
